insert into pur_goods_spec (spec_no, spec_code, barcode, spec_name, is_allow_neg_stock, spec_unit_name, lowest_price, img_url, retail_price, wholesale_price, member_price, market_price, sale_score, pack_score, pick_score, validity_days, weight, length, width, height, tax_rate, prop1, prop2, prop3, prop4, prop5, prop6, remark, sales_days, receive_days, is_not_use_air, tax_number, is_prepare_stock, goods_no, enabled, gmt_create, gmt_modify ) VALUES
( #{item.specNo}, #{item.specCode}, #{item.barcode}, #{item.specName}, #{item.isAllowNegStock}, #{item.specUnitName}, cast(#{item.lowestPrice} as decimal(19,4)), #{item.imgUrl}, cast(#{item.retailPrice} as decimal(19,4)), cast(#{item.wholesalePrice} as decimal(19,4)), cast(#{item.memberPrice} as decimal(19,4)), cast(#{item.marketPrice} as decimal(19,4)), #{item.saleScore}, #{item.packScore}, #{item.pickScore}, #{item.validityDays}, cast(#{item.weight} as decimal(19,4)), cast(#{item.length} as decimal(19,4)), cast(#{item.width} as decimal(19,4)), cast(#{item.height} as decimal(19,4)), cast(#{item.taxRate} as decimal(19,4)), #{item.prop1}, #{item.prop2}, #{item.prop3}, #{item.prop4}, #{item.prop5}, #{item.prop6}, #{item.remark}, #{item.salesDays}, #{item.receiveDays}, #{item.isNotUseAir}, #{item.taxNumber}, #{item.isPrepareStock}, #{item.goodsNo}, 1, getdate(),getdate() )
